name: Ceol
description:
Follow the story of Marina, a half human half selkie little girl, as she experiences the difficulties of growing up just a little bit different from everybody else.

Hello! Unfortunately we hit a bit of snag in getting Ceol onto the app store, but we promise it will be there soon. In the meantime, if you would like to play our game please download the file below and follow these instructions to manually put the app on your phone.

1. Download the file onto your computer.

2. Open Itunes and sign into your apple account.

3. Plug your iphone into your computer. Once Itunes recognizes it, select one of your phone's libraries (music, movies, books, etc).

4. Drag the downloaded file into your iphone's library. Once your phone finishes syncing and installing Ceol, you're ready to play!
